kreator.title: Step 1
kreator.description: Log in to TikTok Shop Seller Center.

kreator.title: Step 2
kreator.description: Click the Affiliate Marketing button at the top

kreator.title: Step 3
kreator.description: Create an affiliate plan based on your needs.

komunitas.title: Step 4
komunitas.description: Get samples and sell the product.
